content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and producing iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (10.0, 0.0) with coal fuel but no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone Furnace at position (13.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and producing iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (16.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and producing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (8.5, 0.5) transferring items between a wooden chest at position (8.5, -0.5) and a wooden chest at position (8.5, 1.5).
- Burner Inserter at position (17.5, 0.5) transferring items between a wooden chest at position (17.5, -0.5) and a wooden chest at position (17.5, 1.5).
- Burner Inserter at position (19.5, 0.5) transferring items between a wooden chest at position (19.5, -0.5) and a wooden chest at position (19.5, 1.5).
- Burner Inserter at position (20.5, 0.5) transferring items between a wooden chest at position (20.5, -0.5) and a wooden chest at position (20.5, 1.5).
- Wooden Chests at positions (8.5, -0.5), (8.5, 1.5), (17.5, -0.5), (17.5, 1.5), (19.5, -0.5), (19.5, 1.5), (20.5, -0.5).

### Research Lab
- Lab at an unspecified position with automation science packs but lacking power.

### Electricity Generator
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (-7.5, 25.5) not connected to any fluid system.
- Steam Engine at position (35.5, 27.5) not connected to the power network and lacking input liquid.
- Small Electric Poles at unspecified positions, part of an electricity group with voltage 0.

### Fluid Transport System
Consists of multiple PipeGroups at various positions, all currently empty and not connected to any fluid system:
- PipeGroup at position (17.5, 3.5).
- PipeGroup at position (-0.5, 11.5).
- PipeGroup at position (5.5, 18.5).
- PipeGroup at position (-8.5, 21.5).
- PipeGroup at position (18.5, 21.5).
- PipeGroup at position (22.5, 20.5).
- PipeGroup at position (-8.5, 23.5).
- PipeGroup at position (-0.5, 22.5).
- PipeGroup at position (14.5, 22.5).
- PipeGroup at position (16.5, 23.5).
- PipeGroup at position (7.5, 24.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using `pickup_entity` function
- Ensure that when using `pickup_entity(entity)`, only the entity should be passed without specifying a position. The second argument must be None if the first argument is an Entity object. This error was repeated multiple times across different steps.
